overview:
Isabel has over 11 years working experience as an IT professional in e-commerce. She built the first Swiss e-commerce websites with over USD 150 million annual sales turnover. Isabel knows all facets of the web, with a strong focus on e-commerce and business process integration.

Her portfolio spans the full range of B2B and B2C e-commerce websites, e-mailings, ERP integration, customer loyalty cards, lead generation, search engine optimization and web analytics.

Isabel holds master degrees in landscape architecture (University of Vienna) and IT (University of Zurich).

degrees.subject: Landscape Architecture
degrees.institution: University of Natural Resources and Life Sciences, Vienna, Austria
